alert.note: Alert for Coastal Collier County; Inland Collier County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 31 at 6:28PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Collier County through 700 PM EDT... At 627 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm near Bonita Springs, moving southwest at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Naples, Naples Park, Vineyards, North Naples, Pelican Bay, Corkscrew Swamp Sanctuary and Quail Creek Estate. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Collier County; Inland Collier County
